project.description: The project name or code name of the shot

version.description: The current version of the file

status.description: The current version of the file

finish_date.description: The date the work on the shot is scheduled to end. (Date in YYYY-MM-DD format)

internal_bid.description: The amount of days we estimate the work on this shot will take

created_date.description: The time and date when this record is being added to the system
